00126             inline SFMLLineRenderer* SFMLLineRenderer::create(float length,float width,ResizeMode mode)
00127             {
00128                         SFMLLineRenderer* obj = new SFMLLineRenderer(length,width,mode = RESIZE_NONE);
00129                         registerObject(obj);
00130                         return obj;
00131             }
